name: twilio
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing xyz cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`twilio` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/twilio/terraform-provider-twilio).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing xyz cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/twilio/terraform-provider-twilio)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-twilio` repo](https://github.com/lbrlabs/pulumi-twilio/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-twilio` repo](https://github.com/twilio/terraform-provider-twilio/issues).

accountSid.description: Your SubAccount SID can be found on the Twilio dashboard at www.twilio.com/console.

password.description: Your Auth Token/ API Secret can be found on the Twilio dashboard at www.twilio.com/console.

username.description: Your Account SID/ API Key can be found on the Twilio dashboard at www.twilio.com/console.

provider.description:
The provider type for the twilio package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

username.description: Your Account SID/ API Key can be found on the Twilio dashboard at www.twilio.com/console.
